26#include <sys/cdefs.h>
27__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: nouveau_nvkm_engine_disp_piocnv50.c,v 1.2 2018/08/27 04:58:31 riastradh Exp $");
28
29#include "channv50.h"
30#include "rootnv50.h"
31
32#include <subdev/timer.h>
33
34static void
35nv50_disp_pioc_fini(struct nv50_disp_chan *chan)
36{
37 struct nv50_disp *disp = chan->root->disp;
38 struct nvkm_subdev *subdev = &disp->base.engine.subdev;
39 struct nvkm_device *device = subdev->device;
40 int chid = chan->chid;
41
42 nvkm_mask(device, 0x610200 + (chid * 0x10), 0x00000001, 0x00000000);
43 if (nvkm_msec(device, 2000,
44 if (!(nvkm_rd32(device, 0x610200 + (chid * 0x10)) & 0x00030000))
45 break;
46 ) < 0) {
47 nvkm_error(subdev, "ch %d timeout: %08x\n", chid,
48 nvkm_rd32(device, 0x610200 + (chid * 0x10)));
49 }
50}
51
52static int
53nv50_disp_pioc_init(struct nv50_disp_chan *chan)
54{
55 struct nv50_disp *disp = chan->root->disp;
56 struct nvkm_subdev *subdev = &disp->base.engine.subdev;
57 struct nvkm_device *device = subdev->device;
58 int chid = chan->chid;
59
60 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x610200 + (chid * 0x10), 0x00002000);
61 if (nvkm_msec(device, 2000,
62 if (!(nvkm_rd32(device, 0x610200 + (chid * 0x10)) & 0x00030000))
63 break;
64 ) < 0) {
65 nvkm_error(subdev, "ch %d timeout0: %08x\n", chid,
66 nvkm_rd32(device, 0x610200 + (chid * 0x10)));
67 return -EBUSY;
68 }
69
70 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x610200 + (chid * 0x10), 0x00000001);
71 if (nvkm_msec(device, 2000,
72 u32 tmp = nvkm_rd32(device, 0x610200 + (chid * 0x10));
73 if ((tmp & 0x00030000) == 0x00010000)
74 break;
75 ) < 0) {
76 nvkm_error(subdev, "ch %d timeout1: %08x\n", chid,
77 nvkm_rd32(device, 0x610200 + (chid * 0x10)));
78 return -EBUSY;
79 }
80
81 return 0;
82}
83
84const struct nv50_disp_chan_func
85nv50_disp_pioc_func = {
86 .init = nv50_disp_pioc_init,
87 .fini = nv50_disp_pioc_fini,
88};
